scripts.build: mkdir -p binary && emcc -std=c17 -O3 clang/css-tree-tokenizer/*.c -o binary/tokenizer.js --emit-tsd tokenizer.d.ts -sMALLOC=emmalloc -sINITIAL_HEAP=8MB -sSTACK_SIZE=8MB -sMODULARIZE=1 -sEXPORT_ES6=1 -sNO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -sEXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=stringToUTF16,HEAP32 -sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_malloc,_free
